trans-unit.source: You create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event to customize how profile property values are validated.
The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event is raised when profile properties are set for a user.
If any property values fail validation, add them to the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
Gets the collection that contains profile properties that have failed validation.
The FailedProperties property contains a collection of the names of the properties that have failed validation.

If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you add the names of the properties that fail validation to the collection in the FailedProperties property.

The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the FailedProperties property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
The profile properties that have failed validation.
Gets the collection of names and values of the profile properties to validate.
The Properties property returns an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains the names and values of the profile properties to set for the user.
If you create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.ValidatingProperties> event, you can retrieve the properties to validate from the Properties property.
If any values fail validation, add them to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService.SetPropertiesForCurrentUser%2A> method returns the collection in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs.FailedProperties%2A> property so that you can determine which properties failed validation.
The names and values of the profile properties to validate.
